title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Impact of MOOC Instructional Design Elements on Mathematics Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain how instructional design elements (content organization, interactivity, assessment) in MOOCs affect learners' sense of control
Learners can analyze the impact of structured instructional design on learning progress perception in VR-based simulation environments
Learners can apply effective MOOC instructional design strategies in smartphone environments to practical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
